name: project_init

Verify schema file in /schemas/

notes: Top-level setup directive; establishes project identity and database scaffolding.

Verify milestone/task uniqueness

name: project_file_write

name: project_update_db

Recalculate and resync file entry

name: project_compliance_check

category.name: compliance

Escalate to associated .md file for guidance

Reconcile project version and completion_path entries

Escalate to user confirmation
